tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FinancialPerformanceForecast (
    Date DATE,
    Revenue DECIMAL,
    Expenses DECIMAL,
    NetIncome DECIMAL,
    CashFlow DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_statements (
  company_name VARCHAR(50),
  balance_sheet_total_assets DECIMAL(18,2),
  balance_sheet_total_liabilities DECIMAL(18,2),
  balance_sheet_equity DECIMAL(18,2),
  income_statement_revenue DECIMAL(18,2),
  income_statement_expenses DECIMAL(18,2),
  income_statement_net_income DECIMAL(18,2)
)

CREATE TABLE cash_flows (
  company_name VARCHAR(50),
  operating_cash_flow DECIMAL(18,2),
  investing_cash_flow DECIMAL(18,2),
  financing_cash_flow DECIMAL(18,2),
  net_cash_flow DECIMAL(18,2)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_statements (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  statement_type VARCHAR(50),
  statement_date DATE,
  total_assets DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_liabilities DECIMAL(10, 2),
  total_equity DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE cash_flows (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_performance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_date DATE,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
  expenses DECIMAL(10, 2),
  net_income DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE company_financials (
   company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   year INT,
   revenue DECIMAL,
   expenses DECIMAL,
   net_profit DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE cash_flows (
   company_id INT,
   year INT,
   operating_cash_flow DECIMAL,
   investing_cash_flow DECIMAL,
   financing_cash_flow DECIMAL,
   FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES company_financials(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_ratios (
   company_id INT,
   year INT,
   current_ratio DECIMAL,
   debt_to_equity_ratio DECIMAL,
   return_on_investment DECIMAL,
   FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES company_financials(company_id)
)

CREATE TABLE financial_forecasts (
   forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_id INT,
   forecast_date DATE,
   forecasted_growth_rate DECIMAL,
   forecasted_revenue DECIMAL,
   forecasted_net_profit DECIMAL,
   FOREIGN KEY (company_id) REFERENCES company_financials(company_id)
)
